application.domain

Interface Player

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PlayerImpl

    public interface Player
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Player that can play the game.
    Author:
    Sanchez

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCard(Card card)
      Adds a card to the player's owned card list
      void addNoble(Noble noble)
      Adds a noble to the player's owned nobles list.
      void addObserver(PlayerObserver o)
      Adds an observer to the player which other classes can listen to.
      void addReservedCard(Card card)
      Adds a reserved card to the player's reserved card list.
      void addToken(Token token)
      Adds a token to the player's owned tokens.
      boolean canAffordCard(java.util.Map<Gem,java.lang.Integer> costs)
      Determines if a player can afford a card.
      void clearSelectableCards()
      Clear selectable cards.
      void debugAddToken(Token token)
      Adds a token to the player's owned tokens (used for debugging).
      void findSelectableCardsFromReserve()
      Finds all the selectable (affordable) cards that are in the player's reserve.
      java.util.Map<Gem,java.lang.Integer> getBonus()
      Gets the current bonus (dicount) a player is benefiting from.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the name of the player.
      java.util.List<Card> getOwnedCards()
      Gets all the cards that the player owns.

      Gets all the nobles that the player owns.

      Gets the current prestige the player has.

      Gets all the cards that are in the player's reserve.

      Gets a list of all selectable (affordable) cards that are in the player's reserve.
      java.util.List<Token> getTokens()
      Gets all the tokens that the player owns.
      java.util.Map<Gem,java.lang.Integer> getTokensGemCount()
      Gets all the values of the tokens a player owns.
      void reserveCardFromField(CardRow cardRow, Card card)
      Reserves a card from the field and puts it in the player's reserved card inventory.
      void returnTokensToField(java.util.List<Token> tokens, PlayingField field)
      Lets a player return tokens to the field when their owned tokens exceed a total of 10.
      void setName(java.lang.String name)
      Sets the name.
      void updatePlayerView()
      Updates the player's view.
